DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess axial IOL rotation surgery MC 6125 AS IOL . At end surgery orientation IOL document short video clip via operate microscope unit . Follow-up examination perform 1 hour , 1 week 6 month surgery . Rotational stability IOL assess use retroillumination image method avoid bias cyclorotation head tilt .
DOC.criteria: Uni bilateral agerelated cataract necessitating phacoemulsification extraction posterior IOL implantation Preceding ocular surgery trauma Recurrent intraocular inflammation unknown etiology Uncontrolled glaucoma Uncontrolled systemic ocular disease Blind fellow eye Microphthalmus Corneal abnormality History uveitis/iritis Iris neovascularization Pseudoexfoliation Proliferative diabetic retinopathy
